ARBooker.name: Booker Storm Rifle 838
ARBooker.description: The Booker is a high-impact three-round burst Storm Rifle for those who like to shoot first.

ARAalto.name: Aalto Storm Rifle 24
ARAalto.description: Widely considered to be the first storm rifle, the Aalto is a marvel in Caoivish engineering. With its two fire modes, it can be used as a rapid-fire assault weapon or a mid-range rifle.

AmmoRifle792.name: 7.92mm
AmmoRifle792.description: Standard ammunition for Storm Rifles and Armored Cars.

MGMalone.name: Malone MK.2
MGMalone.description: This heavy machine gun is bulky enough to require a steady surface to maintain stability. The Malone series of machine guns are unmatched defenders on the battlefield.
damageInfo: Equipped with a low velocity barrel that deals 36% less damage per shot

GrenadeHarpa.name: A3 Harpa Fragmentation Grenade
GrenadeHarpa.description: This anti-personnel fragmentation grenade is designed with pull-pin mechanics and a time fuse for user safety. Serrations in the casing allow for a better grip and increased fragmentation effectiveness.

PistolCascadier.name: Cascadier 873
PistolCascadier.description: This unique sidearm fires in three-round bursts. The Cascadier may not have the stopping power of its cousins, but it more than makes up for it with its lightweight frame, concealability, and fire rate.
damageInfo: Equipped with a low velocity barrel that deals 11% less damage per shot

AmmoPistol8.name: 8mm
damageInfo: If you're making this, either you have a very... special strategy, or something has gone terribly wrong.

PistolRevolver.name: Cometa T2-9
PistolRevolver.description: The Cometa T2-9 boasts remarkable stopping power for a sidearm. This Estrellan mainstay has lived through several generations due to its fine craftsmanship and design.

RifleHangman.name: The Hangman 757
RifleHangman.description: The weapon of choice for pirates and smugglers, its legend is well-earned. With incredibly high stopping power and unique revolver mechanism, the Hangman often plays judge, jury, and executioner.
damageInfo: Compatible ammo with attached The Ospreay (Grenade Launcher): Green Ash Grenade, A3 Harpa Fragmentation Grenade
Equipped with a high velocity barrel that deals 29% extra damage per shot

RifleSampo.name: Sampo Auto-Rifle 77
RifleSampo.description: The precursor to the storm rifle, the Sampo Auto-Rifle, is a mastercraft of its day. With a single shot and automatic fire mode, this versatile rifle may not reach the fire rates of automatic weapons but more than makes up for it with utility.
damageInfo: Equipped with a low velocity barrel that deals 19% less damage per shot

RifleBlakerow.name: Blakerow 871
RifleBlakerow.description: The Blakerow is a carbine with a high rate of fire compared to its bolt-action predecessor. This increased fire rate does come at the cost of innate stopping power; however, its versatility and lightweight frame more than makes up for any perceived shortcomings.
damageInfo: Compatible ammo with attached The Ospreay (Grenade Launcher): Green Ash Grenade, A3 Harpa Fragmentation Grenade
Equipped with a low velocity barrel that deals 11% less damage per shot

RifleCinder.name: Clancy-Cinder M3
RifleCinder.description: The Clancy Cinder is a classic, high-powered long rifle designed for use in mid-to-long range encounters. First deployed with the Hands during a high-risk operation in Acrithia.
damageInfo: Compatible ammo with attached The Ospreay (Grenade Launcher): Green Ash Grenade, A3 Harpa Fragmentation Grenade

RifleHawthorne.name: No. 2B Hawthorne
RifleHawthorne.description: Initially a field-modified Loughcaster, the Hawthorne sports a sawed-off barrel and a much lower profile than its ancestor. While sacrificing accuracy, its lightweight frame opens up the Hawthorne to a much higher degree of flexibility in battle and can be carried alongside a heavier primary firearm.
damageInfo: Equipped with a low velocity barrel that deals 11% less damage per shot

RifleLough.name: No.2 Loughcaster
RifleLough.description: Standard-issue Warden rifle. This bolt-action firearm is as robust as they come and has seen over a century of use on the battlefield.
damageInfo: Compatible ammo with attached The Ospreay (Grenade Launcher): Green Ash Grenade, A3 Harpa Fragmentation Grenade

RifleSniper.name: Clancy-Raca M4
RifleSniper.description: A heavy-duty, long-range marksman rifle. The Clancy-Raca has one hell of a kick but is fitted with a powerful scope, allowing infantry to survey the battlefield and provide support from a safe location.
damageInfo: Equipped with a high velocity barrel that deals 35% extra damage per shot

Shotgun.name: Brasa Shotgun
Shotgun.description: This close-range firearm is an Estrellan import originally designed for hunting wild game. The Brasa is primarily used in urban operations.

SMGLiar.name: No.1 "The Liar" Submachinegun
SMGLiar.description: This unique, heavy-duty submachine gun is not very useful on the run, but with careful aim and adequate cover, becomes a razorblade in the night.

SMGFiddler.name: Fiddler Submachine Gun Model 868
SMGFiddler.description: The Fiddler Submachine gun is a widely used urban combat weapon. Its high rate of fire and compact frame makes it ideal for close-quarters engagements.

GrenadeSmoke.name: PT-815 Smoke Grenade
GrenadeSmoke.description: A standard smoke grenade designed for concealing allied movement or screening the enemy's vision.

GrenadeGas.name: Green Ash Grenade
GrenadeGas.description: Green ash is an asphyxiating toxin. Inhaling it without protection will result in a quick death. Be sure to wear a gas mask with fresh filters when handling Green Ash.

ATRifle.name: 135 Neville Anti-Tank Rifle
ATRifle.description: The Neville is unmatched in its versatility as a portable, magazine-based anti-armor firearm.

ATBonesawTripod.name: Bonesaw MK.3
ATBonesawTripod.description: This variant of the Bonesaw MK.3 is specially designed for use with tripod mounts. This affords it with increased stability and maximum potential range.
damageInfo: High chance to penetrate armoured vehicles
Additional 100% chance to penetrate armoured vehicles
This can be attached to certain vehicles

ATBonesawHand.name: Bonesaw MK.3
ATBonesawHand.description: The pride of the Warden anti-armored arsenal, the Bonesaw Mk.3 has one job; to cut through heavy metal plating of Colonial tanks.
damageInfo: High chance to penetrate armoured vehicles
Additional 100% chance to penetrate armoured vehicles

AmmoATIndirect.name: ARC/RPG
AmmoATIndirect.description: An anti-tank projectili fied from indirect RPG launchers.
damageInfo: High chance to penetrate armoured vehicles
Additional 100% chance to penetrate armoured vehicles

Flamethrower.name: Wilow's Bane Model 845
Flamethrower.description: Named for the unfortunate trees harmed in the development of this highly destructive weapon, the Wilow's Bane utilizes flammable chemicals and fires them into a concentrated stream through an open flame. This liquid flame ignites Colonial emplacements and garrisons to route infantry while reducing their defenses to a pile of ash.
damageInfo: How'd you like your goblins, original, or extra crispy?
Flamethrower.ammoUsed: Wilow's Bane Ammo, "Molten Wind" v.II Ammo

GrenadeTremola.name: Tremola Grenade GPb-1
GrenadeTremola.description: An explosive Estrllan grenade specially designed for use with handheld grenade launchers. This modern grenade boasts a large payload and is deadly to lingering infantry and structural supports.

MGRatcatcher.name: Malone Ratcatcher MK.1
MGRatcatcher.description: Early iterations of this machinegun were built to be emplaced in bunkers and on the decks of lightly armed warships, the Ratcatcher is Harvey Maloneâ€™s first freely mountable infantry weapon designed for field use. Just like its predecessors, this heavy weapon suppresses enemy soldiers with unmatched efficiency.
damageInfo: This can be attached to certain vehicles

AmmoShell30.name: 30mm
AmmoShell30.description: Standard explosive shell with certain small vehicles and infantry weapons

Mortar.name: Cremari Mortar
Mortar.description: This short-range cannon is designed to bombard enemy infantry with indirect fire.
Mortar.ammoUsed: Mortar Shell, Shrapnel Mortar Shell, Flare Mortar Shell

AmmoMortarFlare.name: Flare Mortar Shell
AmmoMortarFlare.description: A long-burning flare that ignites midair to illuminate a large area and reveals enemy targets.

AmmoMortarShrapnel.name: Shrapnel Mortar Shell
AmmoMortarShrapnel.description: A payload filled with shrapnel used with mortar tubes. Devestates nearby infantry.

AmmoMortarHE.name: Mortar Shell
AmmoMortarHE.description: An explosive payload used with mortar tubes.

GrenadeATFlask.name: BF5 White Ash Flask Grenade
GrenadeATFlask.description: An explosive flask used for melting enemy armor. This carefully designed liquid bomb explodes into a dazzling flash of molten debris upon impact.
damageInfo: High chance of disabling Track subsystem

GrenadeHE.name: Mammon 91-b
GrenadeHE.description: This densely packed, high-explosive grenade is designed to damage structures and vehicles.

GrenadeATSticky.name: Anti-Tank Sticky Bomb
GrenadeATSticky.description: An adherable grenade designed to penetrate heavy tank armor. The sticky bomb can only be thrown a short distance and is ineffective against structures.
damageInfo: High chance of disabling Track subsystem

RPGFoebreaker.name: Cutler Foebreaker
RPGFoebreaker.description: This unique duel-barrelled RPG launcher can fire two RPG shells in relatively quick succession. This increase in firepower makes it nearly impossible for a single soldier to operate without the support of a sturdy mount.
damageInfo: This can be attached to certain vehicles

RPGCutler.name: Cutler Launcher 4
RPGCutler.description: The Cutler Launcher is capable of firing and unguided, rocket-propelled grenade over short distances with startling efficiency. Its simple design allows for easy deployment and storage.

AmmoRPG.name: RPG
AmmoRPG.description: A fast-moving explosive projectile used with RPG launchers.

AmmoShell150.name: 150mm
damageInfo: Can ruin structures that have been severly damaged by artillery

AmmoShell120.name: 120mm
damageInfo: Can ruin structures that have been severly damaged by artillery

AmmoShell250.name: 250mm
AmmoShell250.description: A shell that is launched over short distances by a spigot mortar.
damageInfo: Can ruin structures that have been severly damaged by artillery

AmmoShell68.name: 68mm
damageInfo: High chance to penetrate armoured vehicles

RocketWarhead.name: Warhead
RocketWarhead.description: The payload for Ballistic Rockets. A high yield bomb that delivers 3 tons of TNT and is capable of leveling and entire village or town block.
damageInfo: I AM THE GOD OF HELLFIRE

UtilityBinoculars.name: Binoculars
UtilityBinoculars.description: An optical instrument used for viewing distant object.

UtilityHavocCharge.name: Havoc Charge
UtilityHavocCharge.description: A high-powered explosive charge that requires an accompanying detonator. The Havoc Charge is highly effective at demolishing large structures. The charge must be detonated via gunshot. The Havoc Charge's true potential is unleashed when executing strategic demolitions at safe distances.

UtilityListeningKit.name: Listening Kit
UtilityListeningKit.description: A device used to intercept enemy radio broadcasts transmitted from nearby sources.

UtilityMetalBeam.name: Metal Beam
UtilityMetalBeam.description: Used to construct Metal Beam defenses.

UtilityRadioBackpack.name: Radio Backpack
UtilityRadioBackpack.description: Automatically gathers map intel periodically when equipped. The Radio Backpack is also used to transmit other sensitive information across long distances.

UtilityHavocDetonator.name: Havoc Charge Detonator
UtilityHavocDetonator.description: Required to detonate Havoc Charges. The Havoc Charge must be placed before can be deployed.

UtilityShovel.name: Shovel
UtilityShovel.description: A tool for digging Trenches and other entrenched structures.

UtilitySledgeHammer.name: Sledge Hammer
UtilitySledgeHammer.description: A tool used to salvage components from remains of old vehicles and equipment.

UtilityATMine.name: Absime AT-99
UtilityATMine.description: A simple mine that is places under terrain and fitted with a pressure-sensitive plate to detonate under the weight of heavt vehicles. Mines are visible to friendlies and enemies on foot and deactivate after 48 in-game days.

UtilityTripod.name: Tripod
UtilityTripod.description: A mount point for deployable infantry weapons and equipment.

UtilityWrench.name: Wrench
UtilityWrench.description: A multipurpose tool. Can be used to dismantle mines/barbed wire and unlock vehicles.

UtilityBucket.name: Water Bucket
UtilityBucket.description: A bucket that holds water. You can toss water onto fires to extinguish them.

UtilityBayonet.name: Buckhorn CCQ-18
UtilityBayonet.description: Attached to the barrel of a rifle, this short blade can spear enemies in close quarters encounters.

UtilityGasFilter.name: Gas Mask Filter
UtilityGasFilter.description: When attached to a Gas Mask, this filter provides fresh air to the wearer.

UtilityOspreay.name: The Ospreay
UtilityOspreay.description: A rifle attachment that fires grenades with pneumatic force. Along with specialized grenades, it can launch standard grenades.
UtilityOspreay.ammoUsed: Green Ash Grenade, A3 Harpa Fragmentation Grenade

RocketBooster.name: Rocket Booster
RocketBooster.description: A booster engine that provides thrust for launching Ballistic Rockets to long distance targets.

UtilitySatchel.name: Alligator Charge
UtilitySatchel.description: This heavy-duty explosive device is designed to deal significant damage to structures and stationary vehicles.
damageInfo: Can ruin structures that have been severly damaged by artillery

MedicalAidKit.name: First Aid Kit
MedicalAidKit.description: Used by medics to heal others.

MedicalTraumaKit.name: Trauma Kit
MedicalTraumaKit.description: Used by medics to revive wounded soldiers.

MedicalPlasma.name: Blood Plasma
MedicalPlasma.description: A blood component used to treat wounded soldiers on the battlefield.

MedicalSoldierSupplies.name: Soldier Supplies
MedicalSoldierSupplies.description: A standard issue set of supplies for foot soldiers. Bases must be stockpiled with Soldier Supplies in order for players to spawn.

SuppliesMaintenance.name: Maintenance Supplies
SuppliesMaintenance.description: Supplies for maintaining structures. Store at Bases or Maintenance Tunnels to prevent decay on surrounding structures.

UniformAmmo.name: Specialist's Overcoat
UniformAmmo.description: Warden specialists require a uniform designed to optimize their capacity to haul a variety of heavy ammunition.

UniformArmour.name: Gunner's Breastplate
UniformArmour.description: Repourposed from ancient wars, these armour plates are highly effective at stopping enemy small arms fire. That protection comes at the cost of weight, and the wearer will feel quite restricted and encumbered.

UniformEngineer.name: Sapper Gear
UniformEngineer.description: Caoivish engineers are legendary in song and nature. They wear specialized uniforms, outfitted with belts and bags for easy access to tools and handheld materials.

UniformMedic.name: Physician's Jacket
UniformMedic.description: Physicians in the Warden army are umatched and this uniform has a plethora of pockets and bags designed to carry and deploy first aid gear easily.
damageInfo: First Aid Kits and Trauma Kits have reduced encumbrance

UniformOfficer.name: Officer's Regalia
UniformOfficer.description: A formal uniform that denotes a regiment's leading officer. While impractical, the officer on duty may use their authority to discipline subordinates without reperation. Officers hold an important role in the Warden Military, dating back to ancient times when Caoiva was ruled by a dozen kings.
damageInfo: ON CHARGES OF COWARDICE, I SENTENCE YOU TO DEATH

UniformScout.name: Outrider's Mantle
UniformScout.description: The Warden army relies on outriders to provide and recieve vital intelligence. Their gear is sturdy and well-suited for extended operations in rugget terrain and inclement weather.
damageInfo: High chance of not being detected by enemy intelligence

UniformSnow.name: Caoivish Parka
UniformSnow.description: Born and bred in the northern cold, this heavy parka protects Warden infantry from all but the worst blizzards.

UniformTank.name: Padded Boiler Suit
UniformTank.description: Caoivish armour is unmatched in its design and resilience. All crew are provided with a sturdy boilersuit and satchel belts to access essential tools required for tank maintenance and operation.

TruckAmbulance.name: Dunne Responder 3e
TruckAmbulance.description: The Responder Ambulance is efficient at transporting Critically Wounded Soldiers and carrying medical supplies.

ACMG.name: O'Brien V.110
ACMG.description: Warden Armoured Cars are quick, well-rounded urban assault platforms. These anti-infantry vehicles are equipped with twin-barrelled machineguns.

ACGrenade.name: O'Brien v.190 Knave
ACGrenade.description: One of Conor O'Brien's best traits was his ability to modernize and make use of older technology in his designs. The v.190 Knave is the perfect example of this philosophy. Fitted with a modified, outdated twin-grenade launcher turret, the Knave is a surprising combination of speed and subterfuge that quickly routs the enemy, leaving them befuddled.
ACGrenade.ammoUsed: Tremola Grenade GPb-1, PT-815 Smoke Grenade, Green Ash Grenade, A3 Harpa Fragmentation Grenade

TruckBus.name: Dunne Caravaner 2f
TruckBus.description: The Caravaner is a transport vehicle used to shuttle personnel to the front line

TankDestroyerHeavy.name: Noble Widow MK. XIV
TankDestroyerHeavy.description: This deadly tank turns predator into prey. A tank Destroyer, the Noble Widow specializes in ambush tactics, waiting for its quarry and striking with destructive high-velocity shells.
damageInfo: Cannoneer (Front): Equipped with a high velocity barrel that deals 75% extra damage per shot
High chance to penetrate armoured vehicles

FieldAntiTank.name: Collins Cannon 68mm
FieldAntiTank.description: The Collins Cannon is a mobile Anti-Tank field gun firing 68mm armour-piercing rounds.
damageInfo: High chance to penetrate armoured vehicles

FieldCannon.name: Balfour Wolfhound
FieldCannon.description: This destructive short-ranged cannon is designed for direct engagement with enemy fortifications. The Wolfhound is fitted with reinforced shielding and a 40mm barrel.

FieldMachinegun.name: Swallowtail 988/127-2
FieldMachinegun.description: A dual barreled, high calibre anti-infantry machine gun. The Swallowtail is fitted with forward-facing armour plating and is excellent for suppression.
damageInfo: Gunner (Right): Equipped with a high velocity barrel that deals 20% extra damage per shot

FieldMortar.name: Balfour Falconer 250mm
FieldMortar.description: A heavy mobile mortar platform fitted with a thick frontal shield for assaulting fortified locations.
damageInfo: Can ruin structures that have been severly damaged by artillery

TruckFlatbed.name: BMS - Packmule Flatbed
TruckFlatbed.description: A heavy duty shipping transport truck designed by Basset Motor Society. It's built for hauling the heaviest of equipment over long distances with ease.

HalfTrack.name: Niska Mk. I  Gun Motor Carriage
HalfTrack.description: Designed for escort missions and to support infantry operations, the Niska Gun Motor Carriage Half-Track is an armoured, versatile all-terrain vehicle that can be equipped with a variety of mounted weapons.

ArmouredPersonnelCarrier.name: Mulloy LPC
ArmouredPersonnelCarrier.description: The Mulloy Landing Personnel Carrier is an armoured amphibious vehicle designed for carrying troops across large bodies of water to aid in coordinated beach landings and flanking assaults.

LightTank.name: Devitt Mk. III
LightTank.description: A highly maneuverable lightweight tank. Designed for urban enviroments, the Devitt is fitted with a 40mm cannon.

CruiserTankOutlaw.name: Gallagher Outlaw Mk. II
CruiserTankOutlaw.description: Originally designed in response to increasing swarms of Mesean armour, the Outlaw is an exceptionally capable medium tank armed with a long-range 40mm turred and includes a built-in storm rifle support position.
damageInfo: Engine can be boosted for increased top speed

AssaultTankSilverhand.name: Silverhand - Mk. IV
AssaultTankSilverhand.description: The Silverhand assault tank is fitted with destructive dual-barrel armaments, and heavy frontal and rear armour. Its 68mm frontal cannon is paired with a lighter 40mm turret.

Motorcycle.name: Kivela Power Wheel 80-1
Motorcycle.description: A Warden motorcycle used in patrols and fitted with a sidecar. The Kiveal Power Wheel can also gain a momentary speed boost by burning additional fuel.
damageInfo: Engine can be boosted for increased top speed

TruckFuel.name: Dunne Fuelrunner 2d
TruckFuel.description: The Fuelrunner is a heavy Dunne rig designed to transport and distribute large quantities of Fuel.

ScoutTankSpire.name: King Spire Mk. I
ScoutTankSpire.description: This small tank has been recently recommissioned to the Warden arsenal. It boasts a high maneuverability and an antenna that allows for long-range communications during high-stakes recon operations.
damageInfo: Turret (Front): Equipped with a low velocity barrel that deals 36% less damage per shot

LightUtilityVehicle.name: Drummond 100a
LightUtilityVehicle.description: A multipurpose off-road Warden vehicle that can scout nearby targets.

TruckDump.name: Dunne Loadlugger 3c
TruckDump.description: This standard Truck is fitted with a resource hopper in place of the standard cargo hold. This allows for a much greater capacity for resources at the expense of space for cargo.

Truck.name: Dunne Transport
Truck.description: A heavy-duty Warden truck used to mobilize troops and supplies.

ShipBarge.name: BMS - Aquatipper
ShipBarge.description: A large shipping vessel, the Aquatipper is used to transport vehicles, equipment, and personnel over large bodies of water.

ShipFreighter.name: BMS - Ironship
ShipFreighter.description: The Basset Motor Society's Ironship-class shipping vessel is used to freight shippable goods and heavy vehicles.

ShipGunboatDouble.name: 74c-2 Ronan Meteora Gunship
ShipGunboatDouble.description: The Meteora Gunship replaces the machinegun with another identical 120mm artillery cannon on the bow.
damageInfo: Can ruin structures that have been severly damaged by artillery

ShipGunboat.name: 74b-1 Ronan Gunship
ShipGunboat.description: A naval vessel designed to bombard coastal targets. The Ronan is fitted with a 120mm light artillery cannon and a 12.7mm Machinegun
damageInfo: Turret (Bow): Equipped with a high velocity barrel that deals 20% more damage per shot
Can ruin structures that have been severly damaged by artillery

ShipWhiteWhale.name: BMS - White Whale
ShipWhiteWhale.description: A heavily armoured vessel, the Basset Motor Society's White Whale-class troop transports can deploy on faraway beaches to function as a permament forward operating base.

ConstructionVehicle.name: BMS - Universal Assembly Rig
ConstructionVehicle.description: A specialized vehicle designed by the Basset Motor Society used in the construction of large structures.

Crane.name: BMS - Class 2 Mobile Auto-Crane
Crane.description: The Basset Motor Society's Class 2 Mobile Auto-Crane is used to lift and reposition vehicles and very heavy equipment.

ConcreteMixer.name: Concrete Mixer
ConcreteMixer.description: A portable device that mixes various materials to form Concrete, which are used to build heavily fortified structures.

EmplacedAntiTank.name: Leary Shellbore 68mm
EmplacedAntiTank.description: A defensive emplacement with a 68mm Anti-Tank cannon. This rudimentary weapon was once built to fit onto the hull of large naval vessels, but was eventually pahsed out and repurposed.
damageInfo: High chance to penetrate armoured vehicles

ArtilleryExalt.name: Huber Exalt 150mm
ArtilleryExalt.description: A heavy cannon designed to shatter the garrisons and fortifications of advancing forces. The Exalt is best utilized when emplaced into a defensive position to take advantage of it's impressive range.
damageInfo: Can ruin structures that have been severly damaged by artillery

ArtilleryLariat.name: Huber Lariat 120mm
ArtilleryLariat.description: A light artillery cannon designed to be a fixture in defensive fortifications. The Lariat sports a formidibable long-range 120mm cannon designed to put immense pressure on enemy infantry.
damageInfo: Can ruin structures that have been severly damaged by artillery

EmplacedMachinegun.name: Leary Snare Trap 127
EmplacedMachinegun.description: The Snare Trap is a repurposed anti-aircraft flak cannon used to fortify emplaced positions with twin anti-infantry machine guns.
damageInfo: Machine Gun: Equipped with a high velocity barrel that deals 20% extra damage per shot

ContainerMaterial.name: Resource Container
ContainerMaterial.description: A container that can carry large quantities of resources and can be transpoted by certain vehicles.

ContainerCrate.name: Shipping Container
ContainerCrate.description: A container for shipping very large quantities of Crates using Crane loaded vehicles. This typ of container can only be unloaded at Storage Depots and Seaports.

FuelContainer.name: Liquid Container
FuelContainer.description: Stores a high volume of liquids, supporting a variety of fuel types. Nearby structures or vehicles can be refueled directly from this container.
